results.name: First k>n such that k | n^k + n.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n)=n+1 if n is odd. a(n) <= 2n+2. - _Robert Israel_, Sep 13 2018
maple: if n &^k + n mod k = 0 then return k fi
results.author: _Robert G. Wilson v_
ext: a(0)=1 and a(1)=2 inserted by _Robert Israel_, Sep 13 2018
